ul.li: [Custom Keywords] Organize Custom Keywords in an alphabetical order in Keyword Browser and support categorizing them with keywordObject. Learn more
Improve Katalon Studio's performance of checking/unchecking test folders containing more than 50 Test Cases
Log Viewer has a new design: Root cause shown on the top of the stack trace and Test Object ID added to Seleniumâ€™s common exceptions for better debugging.
[Desktop Testing] Increase the default timeout and allow changing this default value when using switchToWindowTitle during recording and executing tests. Learn more
